title: SEO Optimization Task
description: This schema represents fields related to SEO enhancement without modifying core article content.

title.description: Suggested SEO-optimized title for the post.

slug.description: Suggested SEO-friendly URL slug (kebab-case, lowercase, no stop words).

focusKeyword.description: Primary keyword the post should rank for.

metaDescription.description: Suggested meta description for search engine snippets.

seoAnalysis.description: Detailed analysis of current SEO health.

readabilityScore.description: Readability assessment based on structure, length, and flow.

focusKeywordUsage.description: Whether the focus keyword is used in key areas (title, meta, first paragraph, etc.).

metaDescriptionLength.description: Character count of the meta description.

recommendations.description: Actionable suggestions to improve SEO performance.

actions.description: Control flags to indicate what fields should be applied or updated.

updateMetaDescription.description: Whether to apply the suggested meta description.

addFocusKeyword.description: Whether to apply the suggested focus keyword.

modifyTitle.description: Whether to apply the suggested title.

updateSlug.description: Whether to apply the suggested slug.
